attributes.action: Grant asylum seeker right and indefinite leave to remain in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I'm an asylum seeker. My Home Office reference is M709238, and Port reference: SP/02/9080.  Please sign my petition in support of my asylum right, as there has been gross injustice in my case, and to be returned to my country of origin would most probably would be death, imprisonment withour trial, or torture by elements of the police force or a criminal gang, actively beheading their purported enemies.  Thank you.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
